original_text:
They will be herded together
    like prisoners bound in a dungeon;
they will be shut up in prison
    and be punished after many days.
korean_text: 그들이 죄수가 깊은 옥에 모임 같이 모이게 되고 옥에 갇혔다가 여러 날 후에 형벌을 받을 것이라

sentences.original_text: like prisoners bound in a dungeon
they will be shut up in prison
and be punished after many days
